mean_cn: v. 使省悟，解迷惑，释疑，矫正
mean_en: to show or convince (someone) that a belief is incorrect
sentence: Mother disabused us of the idea that we can sit around on the couch all day.
sentence_trans: 妈妈纠正了我们以为可以整天坐在沙发玩的错误观念。
word_etyma: dis去掉 ＋ ab不 ＋ use用 → dis去掉 ＋ abuse不符合正确用法的=滥用 → 去掉滥用 → disabuse纠正错误
